title: Web Service: Desjardins / Nethris
content: Web Service DesjardinsIn this video you will discover the following points:Web Service Desjardins presentationHarmonization of existing filesImport files from Desjardins to EmprezSynchronize files from Desjardins to EmprezExport pay from Emprez to DesjardinsWeb Service NethrisIn this video you will discover the following points:Web Service Nethris presentationHarmonization of existing filesImport files from Nethris to EmprezSynchronize files from Nethris to EmprezExport pay from Emprez to NethrisActivate the Web Service from Nethris or EmployeurDMake sure you have the correct role name in the Nethris or EmployeurD application to be able to perform the following steps. If you are not in the right role, please contact your payroll or your application manager.If you do not have the right role, the application will tell you in Step 1.1. Activate the API connector on Nethris or EmployeurDUnder the Administration menu> Configuration of company options> Check the box Activate the API connectorOnly the application manager can activate the API and create service users associated with external applications.If your company uses a custom API connector (in-house type), please refer to the "API - Data access" guide available in the Reference documents section of the Documentation page. You will need to contact your web service customer service to obtain your API ID.2. Create an API user linked to your company on Nethris or EmployeurDIn the Administration> Add a user sectionUnder Identification, select the type of use "Service user"Enter the desired User Code (between 6 and 10 alphanumeric characters)Select the Application associated with the user,Select the Status "Active"Under Communication preferences select the communication language,Click on Save.Read the information displayed on the screen then click on Print letter to deliver a letter containing the password and user code to the new user,Click Continue,Check the companies and the levels of the administrative structure to which the user will have access,Pour donner accès à toutes les compagnies / structures, cochez la "Accès à toutes les compagnies" et/ou la case "Accès à toute la structure",To give access to all companies / structures, check the "Access to all companies" and/or the box "Access to the entire structure",Click Save to complete the procedure.3. Send us the information about Nethris or EmployeurD Gather this information in a ticket to associate it with your Emprez account.Your Nethris or EmployeurD customer number API user codeCompany code (series of 7 digits)Web service passwordIf you have several companies under the same customer number, you must make sure that these steps are done for each company, then specify in the ticket the name and the corresponding company code.If you experience complications, please contact your payroll or your application manager.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
